code:
import i18n from'i18next';import LanguageDetector from'i18next-browser-languagedetector';import{initReactI18next}from'react-i18next';import{registerLocale}from'react-datepicker';import{enUS,es,pt,fr,el,bn,th,tr,ja,hi}from'date-fns/locale';// Locales
import*as locales from'./locales';registerLocale('en',enUS);registerLocale('es',es);registerLocale('pt',pt);registerLocale('fr',fr);registerLocale('el',el);registerLocale('bn',bn);registerLocale('th',th);registerLocale('tr',tr);registerLocale('ja',ja);registerLocale('hi',hi);// Translations
i18n.use(LanguageDetector).use(initReactI18next)// passes i18n down to react-i18next
.init({resources:locales,ns:'main',missingKeyHandler:false,fallbackLng:'en',fallbackNS:'main',interpolation:{escapeValue:false},debug:true});export default i18n;
